rukus.text: bam-e il-eona yebaehala geuleonabamjung naenaega animyeo
geugeos-ui jeolban animyeon geu iha myeon doemyeo
geu isang-ilado joh-eunila geu ligo kkulan-eul nangsonghadoe neuligo li deum-eul dueo ilg-eula
naega geudaeege jung-yohan meseji leul bonaelila
sillo bamjung-e il-eonaneun geos-eun eolyeoun il-idoe yebaehago chanmihaneun mal-eul hagie gajang jeoghabhan ttaela
geudae junim-ui ileum-eul sang-gihago on jeongseong-eul dahayeo geubunman-eul seong-gila
geubun-eun dongjjoggwa seojjog-ui junim-eu lo geubun oeeneun sin-i eobsnani geubun man-eul bohojalo taeghala
geudeul-i malhaneun geos-e innaeha go jeongjunghan taedolo geudeul-eul meollihala
geojishaneun jadeul-eun naege dula geudeullo hayeogeum hyanglagke hayeo jamsi man yuyehalila
na-egeneun geudeul-eul mukk-eul jogsoe wa geudeul-eul taeul bul-i iss-eumyeo
daejiwa sandeul-i keuge dong-yoha neun geunal sandeul-eun molae sandeomiga doe eo heulleo naelinila
sillo naega geudaedeul-ege han seonjijaleul bonaem-eun neohuileul wihan jeung in-i doedolog ham-ini ineun naega pa lao-ege seonjijaleul bonaen geosgwa gat nola
geuleona palaoneun geu seonjija ege bogjonghaji anihayeoss-eumae naneun geuege mugeoun eungbeol-eul naelyeossnola
neohuiga hananim-eul bujeonghandamyeon-eolin-iga hohobaegbal-i doeneun geunal neohuineun neohui jasin-eul eotteohge boho halyeo haneunyo
geuttae haneul-eun gallajigo geubun ui yagsog-eun ihaengdoenila
sillo igeos-i hanaui gyohun-i ni tteus-i issneun ja junim-ui gil-eul tta leuge hala
